ygData.subject: RE: looking for info in Thicken Mana series
ygData.msgSnippet: Available at the brownie camp.. does that mean they won t KOS us as we pass. I have yet to hear of anyone not getting whacked if they got too close.... (maybe
ygData.messageBody:
Available at the brownie camp.. does that mean they won't KOS us as we pass.
I have yet to hear of anyone not getting whacked if they got too close....
(maybe I just never talked to an enchanter before! :)

-----Original Message-----
From: mstokes [mailto:mstokes@...]
Sent: Monday, October 04, 1999 12:24 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] looking for info in Thicken Mana series


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

Christopher King wrote:

> From: Christopher King <CKing@...>
>
> I can't say myself.. My guess would be that it provides basically a mana
> potion that can then be drunk to add mana quickly (each higher level spell
> offering more mana) but I don't know..just a guess.
>
>

Nope, its used for item enchantments. The 3rd Book of Wu speaks of making 1
such item. I won't post the spoiler here (Basically because I never wrote
it
down) But it is widely available on the web. Work on your tailoring skill,
it
will prove useful for creating this enchanted item.
